title: Italian-style tofu with black olives & linguine

ingredients.item: 2 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Sundried Tomato Paste
1 tsp Cooks’ Ingredients Organic Mixed Herbs
¼ tsp vegan vegetable bouillon powder
½ x 25g pack flat leaf parsley, chopped
25g Sheese Vegan Grated Mozzarella Style (selected stores)

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan and gently fry the onion for 5 minutes until lightly browned. Lightly mash the tofu on a plate to break it up and add to the pan, stirring for 2 minutes. Add the wine, then the tomato paste, mixed herbs, olives, bouillon powder, half the parsley, plenty of black pepper and 100ml water. Cook gently for 5 minutes.

Cook the pasta in boiling, lightly salted water for 8-10 minutes until just tender. Lightly drain, returning the pasta to the pan with a little water still clinging. Add the tofu sauce and stir gently to combine. Transfer to plates and serve topped with the vegan mozzarella style and remaining parsley.
